# pair

> AI-assisted development knowledge base for this project.

- [How to Breakdown User Stories - AI-Assisted Guide](.pair/knowledge/how-to/07-how-to-breakdown-user-stories.md)
- [How to Refine a User Story - AI-Assisted Guide](.pair/knowledge/how-to/08-how-to-refine-a-user-story.md)
